relation.text: Yesterday & to day he is thank God quite well , he eat
arrived at Bath , which is a month
eat his dinner with an appetite , for near four months
Gallop round the moon , it is reckon 'd a very fine peice of workmanship & is about seven hundred years
met Mr . & Mrs. Gardiner & her two fine children . Monday
eat a very good dinner yesterday
a day or two ; but they liked
s eyes , I have that very letter Now
a tour with his daughter & grand daughter this summer
one day as I was walking
were taken for sisters , last Friday
cry for joy -- -- -- M. G . Novr : 12 th 1785
